items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars New closet staple!
items.body: Hands down, a staple neutral piece for my closet. I've worn it to work a few times since buying it a few weeks ago and got a lot of compliments. The stripes are neutral but do have a shimmer to them. It's structure is versatile- can wear with work pants, leather, jeans or skirt- it's longer length so you could also wear it with leggings to dress it down. It's light and breathable, so you could layer it and the fabric is soft. If you're hesitant to buy it, you won't regret it. It's a perfect sweater for fall/winter and well made. Read more
items.author: Madi

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars They forgot to mention that it's sheer
items.body: I'd like to say that this expensive sweater came well packaged, but it was almost wadded up in a plastic bag like any $20 sweater you get from Amazon. The Lurex stripes were way more metallic than the photo/description led me to believe, but the reason I'm returning it was that the sweater was so sheer that I could clearly see my bra, almost the color of my skin, beneath. The whole sweater felt like fast fashion, not "heirloom-worthy." Read more
items.author: Morgen Wilson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and warm
items.body: I ordered this in a size Large and I'm nearly 5'9", 160lbs, and 36B. The fit is pleasant without being constricting. I've gotten other off brand cashmere before that I found incredibly itchy. This sweater being a blend seems to be the right kind of blend for me. I don't find it itchy and it's super soft. The color and style are also very neutral making it an easy cold weather staple. It's also super warm for as lightweight as it is. Even though it's a bit pricy, I like it a lot! Read more
items.author: Nomadic

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Timeless and Cozy Turtleneck
items.body: Love!!! Medium weight so great for layering. It’s a nice color too - cream/off white with sand colored stripe. I will be wearing this a ton! Timeless and effortless Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not 100% Cashmere but mostly
items.body: When I ordered this sweater, it was advertised as 100% cashmere. This is a bit deceiving as the base is cashmere but the metallic threading is not. Still, it is a soft, oversized comfy sweater except for the turtleneck, which is a bit small and tight to me. Although there is metallic thread for the stripes, I didn’t find it itchy at all. Everything about this soft and cozy. It might make a nice way to dress up a pair of jeans for a casual evening. The sparkles give it a bit of zing that way. Seems well made and a decent price for mostly cashmere. This is a review for: the NAADAM Store NAADAM Womens Soft Lurex Stripe Sweater Currently ~$158 Read more
items.author: KulaBestie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars generously sized luxe top
items.body: Excellent top. Very soft cashmere sweater with just enough polyester blended into the mix to give it some extra stretch. Label text reads 91% cashmere, 7% polyester, and 2% metallic fabric. The metallic fabric is basically the lurex stripe that's woven into the outer side of the cashmere base. So yeah, there's a lot of cashmere here, and it's wonderfully soft. The fabric weight is on the thinner side, but more towards a medium than not, and will keep you toasty. Great for fall days like today, and the look is excellent. It can be dressed up or down so this can be a closet staple for sure. The only thing is I ordered a 1X as that was the suggested size but was sent a Medium, and while I'd like it a little looser around the neck it basically fits well, which is crazy since I'm 5'8 195lbs. So yeah, make of that what you will. Read more
items.author: a human being

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Description says 100% Cashmere. It's not! Label says Cashmere/polyester blend. Also scratchy! Ugh!
items.body: Description says 100% Cashmere. Label on the shirt says it's a blend of cashmere and polyester. 1 star because I hate false advertising. Also because it's scratchy. Shouldn't be if it were all cashmere. How do companies get away with this? Read more
items.author: W K Family

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable
items.body: The media could not be loaded. It has good quality, feels soft and warm, and the design looks beautiful. The color stands out, it’s comfortable, and the quality is excellent for the price. Size is fit and made with good material too. Read more
items.author: Mil

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
